title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Burhunka, Tyahynka, Kizomys, Stanislav of Kherson region and Kherson city. Russian ...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Burhunka, Tyahynka, Kizomys, Stanislav of Kherson region and Kherson city. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Tokarivka of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
